entry.lex: A Severed Wasp is available in print, with The Library of Congress Classification PS3523.E55 S4 1982. Its ISBN number is 0-374-26131-8, and its OCLC number is 8805735.
The Book A Severed Wasp (ISBN number 0-374-26131-8) is available in print and has the OCLC number 8805735. It has the Library of Congress Classification PS3523.E55 S4 1982.
